title: Executive Order 7487-A-Designation of R. Walton Moore, Assistant Secretary of State, To Act as Secretary of State
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by Section 179 of the Revised Statutes of the United States (5 U.S.C. Section 6), I hereby authorize and direct R. Walton Moore, Assistant Secretary of State, to perform the duties of the Secretary of State during the absence of the Secretary of State.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7487-A-Designation of R. Walton Moore, Assistant Secretary of State, To Act as Secretary of State Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/356193
